document_data.caption: A maps showing Krak al-Sajjaan overlooking the mighty Nogaro River.
document_data.name: Krak al-Sajjaan
document_data.mainbody: '''Krak al-Sajjaan''' was a ''[[Midani dictionary|qal'at]]'' found in the [[Cities of the Ancients]] region of [[east Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Geography: This fortress was found toward the southern region of [[al-Sayaj Mountains]]. It stood approximately {{SI|60|mi|k}} slightly northwest of [[Kadarasto]] on the outskirts of the jungle.
document_data.Activities: Krak al-Sajjaan had a commanding view of the grasslands around the southern arm of the [[Nogaro River]]. It was unoccupied as of 1367 DR.
